name: Hidden Fear
description:
To win you must kill all the monsters and from last you get the key for door in mansion with final boss! Kill it, but be ready. It's a strange powerful demon from deep old times. Based on 'The Lurking Fear' written by H.P. Lovecraft.

To get in-game help press 'h'.

The game currently in beta.
There may be some bugs.

Future updates:
-Animations
-Water
-Map
-Monster corpses and much more!
-Some sprites updates
-Mac and Linux versions

This is a completely opensourse game.
Source code available on github (https://github.com/b0000ring/hidden_fear)
If you find some bugs or if you have some suggestions - welcome!
